types.html:
faire l'effet [with de ‘someone/something’]

  1. to have the effect (of), to come (as)
    faire l'effet d'une bombe ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
    faire l'effet d'une douche froide ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
  2. to give (to someone) the impression of being, to appear (to someone) to be, to strike (someone) as [with à ‘someone’]
    Synonyms: sembler être, paraître
    Il m'a fait l'effet d'un honnête homme. ― He struck me as an honest man.

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Not to be confused with faire de l'effet or faire effet.
trans: to have the effect , to come
to give  the impression of being, to appear  to be, to strike  as

title: faire l'effet
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /fɛʁ l‿e.fɛ/
